mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fboard(fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(fboard_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{ftitle}, #{fcontent}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, rdate, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube FROM fboard ORDER BY fboardno DESC

SELECT fboardno, memberno, ftitle, fcontent, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, youtube FROM fboard
WHERE ftitle=#{ftitle}
WHERE UPPER(ftitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(fcontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY fboardno DESC
